title: Monetary Policy Influences on Global Financial Conditions and International Capital Flows
content: For release on delivery  3:15 a.m. EDT (9:15 a.m. local time)  May 8, 2018      Monetary Policy Influences on Global Financial Conditions   and International Capital Flows    Panel remarks by     Jerome H. Powell     Chairman     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at     “Challenges for Monetary Policy and the GFSN in an Evolving Global Economy”  Eighth High-Level Conference on the International Monetary System   sponsored by the International Monetary Fund and Swiss National Bank     Zurich, Switzerland                 May 8, 2018
